summary: Website update for The Creator of Side Quests: replace the entire Services page with new 'Enchanted Services' content and ensure all sections use the site's consistent bordered styling.
architectural_notes: Services page should reuse the site's existing border/styling system so all sections consistently render with borders (avoid one-off CSS).

existing_features.title: Replace all existing content on the Services page with the user-provided “Enchanted Services of The Creator of Side Quests” copy, removing the current artifact-focused services list/accordion content.

Ensure every major part of the new Services page content is visually enclosed with the site’s consistent bordered styling (use the existing MysticalBorder styling pattern used across the site), so that each section of content has borders like the rest of the website.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace entire Services page content with provided 'Enchanted Services of The Creator of Side Quests' copy
Apply the site's existing bordered style to every part/section of the Services page content (consistent borders like rest of website)
